name: media-collective
description: A JavaScript client for the Widen Collective

scripts.docs: jsdoc index.js README.md && git checkout gh-pages &&  mv out/* . ; git add -u && rm -rf out && git commit -m 'docs: Update' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.test: npm run style && npm run test-node && npm run test-browser
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage-node && npm run coverage-browser
scripts.coverage-browser: echo "browserify --debug -t coverify test/all-test.js | node | coverify" && exit 0
scripts.dev: npm run dev-node && npm run dev-browser
scripts.build: npm run build-node && npm run build-browser
scripts.build-browser: browserify index.js --standalone collective > static/bundle.js && cat static/bundle.js | uglifyjs > static/bundle.min.js
scripts.version: npm run build && git add static/bundle.*js && git commit -m 'version bump' && git push origin master --follow-tags

author: Mark Feltner
